synopsis.text: Rin Nanakura, a first-year high school student, finds herself smitten by the charming Eiji Kitahama, a second-year student in their drama club. In an attempt to win his affection and help him achieve his dream of becoming a popular actor, Rin employs her acting prowess to present Eiji with a diverse array of lovestruck characters, each with their own unique personalities. As the pair's friendship blossoms, Rin struggles to reveal her true feelings amidst the myriad of roles she plays. Will Eiji ever recognize the genuine affection behind Rin's captivating performances, or will their love story remain confined to the stage? Join these two drama club members as they navigate the complexities of love, self-expression, and the pursuit of their dreams.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
